donate: - donate to developpers/maintainers of the program

wrapper_commands.wsend: - sends wDUCO via tron - you should have some TRX or tron energy for txn fees
wrapper_commands.unwrap: - unwrap wDUCO - you should have some TRX or tron energy for txn fees
wrapper_commands.cancelunwrap: - sends back pending unwrap values to wallet - you should have some trx or tron energy for txn fees
